function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of Coronavirus disease 2019 (Covid-19)","Impact":"Severe impact on health, safety, economic well-being, healthcare, food security, stability of economies, financial institutions, and democracies","Mitigation":"Widespread availability of fast analytical test methods for certain biomolecules","Technologies":"Fast analytical test methods for biomolecules","People":"General population, healthcare workers, governments, economies","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Facile transmission of SARS-CoV-2 via the air","Impact":"Difficulty in containment, control, or mitigation of transmission due to concealed asymptomatic carriers","Mitigation":"Efficient public health resource allocation, targeted containment measures, increased testing","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring, targeted testing, contact tracing technology","People":"General population, healthcare workers, governments","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges in determining the distribution and magnitude of infected populations","Impact":"Difficulty in directing public health resources essential for containment, control, or mitigation","Mitigation":"Increased testing, contact tracing, data analytics for population health monitoring","Technologies":"Population health analytics, contact tracing technology, rapid testing kits","People":"General population, healthcare workers, governments","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations, healthcare institutions"}]}
